attributes.action: pass legislation to prevent "vulture funds" recovering in the English courts any more than the original amount spent to buy sovereign debt, without interest
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: These funds buy developing countries' debt and then take them to court in England (and possibly Scotland and elsewhere, but I cannot address that here). Even when the court drastically reduces the payout, it can be as much as five times what the vulture funds paid. My suggestion should put an an end to this, at least in English courts. The original lenders are the ones who should decide whether to go to court, and should be too embarrassed to  exploit poor countries in this way
